text:
@PMOIndia @smritiirani Sir what's the use when this nation is already ignoring one of the sure shot alternative cure of Covid19 i.e homoepathy, with nearly 100% recovery rate. Ignoring something so important at this crucial hour was disappointing.
@PMOIndia #HomoeopathyHeals @smritiirani https://t.co/q5xW66w4KM
